thread.title: Sandra Jones
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Sandra Jones

author: Sandra Jones
title: Sandra Jones
text: The cot arrived the day after ordering .This pleased us as there was no waiting around for the frequently offered 5 working day delivery service. We have erected the cot and we're very happy with the quality and design. The mum -to - be was delighted with our gift so an all around successful purchase. I would definitely recommend the item and the company. Excellent service.
